text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump #DonTheCon does not deserve any birthday messages when he is the one stoking racial hatred and causing over 117000 Americans to perish of COVID19. #TrumpTheFakePresident
#TrumpTgeFakePresident

#TrumpDontMatter
